Name: [Affinity] Bangboo Give Me Strength
Desc: Grace has evoked the Mindscape: <color=#FFAF2C>[Lightning Piercer]</color>. After launching a Dash Attack or Dodge Counter, your character can <color=#2BAD00>immediately follow up with</color> certain attacks near the end of the Basic Attack combo. Additionally, she gains the <color=#FFAF2C>A Massage for Eous</color> effect (Effective for {CReplaceCardParam:BattleCount_Card1100952,1,2} more battles).
Desc2: Grace is in fine form. A Bangboo's hug doesn't just relieve exhaustion, it also bring a steady stream of strength.
